worktrees.title: Worktrees
worktrees.description: Manage isolated workspaces for your Auto Claude tasks
worktrees.selectProjectToView: Select a project to view worktrees
worktrees.emptyDescription: Worktrees are created automatically when Auto Claude builds features. They provide isolated workspaces for each task.
worktrees.emptyHint: You can also create terminal worktrees from the Agent Terminals tab.
worktrees.mergeDescription: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.
worktrees.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and all uncommitted changes. This action cannot be undone.
worktrees.deleteTerminalDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and its branch. Any uncommitted changes will be lost.
worktrees.bulkDeleteDescription: This will permanently delete the selected worktrees and all their uncommitted changes. This action cannot be undone.

worktreeCleanup.title: Complete Task

worktreeCleanup.warning: Make sure you have merged or saved any changes you want to keep before proceeding.
worktreeCleanup.errorDescription: Failed to cleanup worktree. Please try again.
